EmailTemplate.description: Students who have not resolved their Encumbrance
EmailTemplate.name: Students who have not resolved their Encumbrance
EmailTemplate.subject: Students who have not resolved their Encumbrance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I am writing to you regarding students who have been encumbered in your Faculty. Please find attached a report as at XXXX which identifies students in your Faculty who have been sent a number of emails by MGE regarding an encumbrance on their enrolment. These students were informed that they needed to resolve the encumbrance in order for them to re-enrol for 20XXX. Unfortunately the students on the list have not yet resolved their encumbrance and therefore are unable to re-enrol for the following year.
Could you please follow-up with these students as a final attempt to have them resolve the encumbrance and therefore re-enrol before close of University business Wednesday 21 December 20XXX
If there are any exceptional circumstance as to why a particular student cannot re-enrol please email MGE urgently with details.
Please note that should students not be re-enrolled by 5:00pm on Wednesday 21 December 20XXX their enrolment will be discontinued for failure to re-enrol and scholarships (where applicable) will be suspended.
Should you have any concerns or require further assistance, you are welcome to contact me.
Kind regards,
Kerry Theodora
Team Leader, Candidature Management | Graduate Research Services
_____________________________________________ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D, 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia Phone: +61 3 990 53009 | Fax: +61 3 990 55042 Email: mge-candidature@monash.edu Website: monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
